title: Orderly One API
description: Orderly One DEX Creator API - Create and manage decentralized exchanges

authentication.description: Orderly One uses wallet signature-based authentication. Users sign a message with their EVM wallet to obtain a JWT token.

flow.title: Request Nonce
flow.description: POST /auth/nonce with wallet address to get a unique nonce

flow.title: Sign Message
flow.description: Sign the message "Sign this message to authenticate with Orderly One: {nonce}" with your wallet

flow.title: Verify Signature
flow.description: POST /auth/verify with address and signature to get JWT token

flow.title: Use Token
flow.description: Include the JWT token in Authorization header for all subsequent requests

endpoints.description: Retrieve the DEX information for the currently authenticated user
Create a new DEX for the authenticated user with the provided configuration
Check the current rate limiting status for DEX operations
Retrieve a list of available blockchain networks for token selection
Retrieve a specific DEX by its ID
Update an existing DEX's configuration

responses.description: Invalid request - invalid TradingView color configuration
User is not authorized to update this DEX

endpoints.description: Delete a DEX and its associated resources

responses.description: User is not authorized to delete this DEX

endpoints.description: Update the social media and branding information for the user's DEX

responses.description: Invalid request - invalid token chain or token not found
User is not authorized to update this DEX

endpoints.description: Get the status of GitHub Actions workflows for a DEX's repository

responses.description: Invalid request - DEX does not have a repository

endpoints.description: Get detailed information about a specific workflow run

responses.description: Invalid run ID or DEX does not have a repository

endpoints.description: Check if template updates are available for the DEX

responses.description: Invalid request - DEX does not have a repository

endpoints.description: Trigger a redeployment of the DEX to apply template updates

responses.description: Invalid request - DEX does not have a repository

endpoints.description: Set a custom domain for the DEX
Remove the custom domain from a DEX

responses.description: DEX does not have a custom domain configured
User is not authorized to modify this DEX

endpoints.description: Update whether the DEX appears on the public leaderboard
Generate a nonce that the user must sign to authenticate
Verify the signed message and return an authentication token
Validate if an authentication token is still valid
Check if the current user is an admin
Generate CSS theme variations based on a text prompt using AI. Returns 3 theme variants.

responses.description: Server error or CSS validation failed

endpoints.description: Generate CSS overrides for specific HTML elements based on a text prompt using AI. Returns 3 CSS override variants.

responses.description: Server error or CSS validation failed

endpoints.description: Verify a graduation fee transaction and create a broker ID for the DEX

requestBody.schema:
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "txHash": {
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 10,
      "maxLength": 100,
      "description": "Transaction hash to verify",
      "example": "0xabc123def456789..."
    },
    "chain": {
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 1,
      "maxLength": 50,
      "description": "Blockchain chain name",
      "example": "ethereum"
    },
    "chainId": {
      "type": "integer",
      "description": "Chain ID",
      "example": 1
    },
    "chain_type": {
      "type": "string",
      "enum": [
        "EVM",
        "SOL"
      ],
      "default": "EVM",
      "description": "Chain type",
      "example": "EVM"
    },
    "brokerId": {
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 5,
      "maxLength": 15,
      "pattern": "^[a-z0-9_-]+$",
      "description": "Desired broker ID",
      "example": "my-broker"
    },
    "makerFee": {
      "type": "number",
      "minimum": 0,
      "maximum": 15,
      "description": "Maker fee in basis points (0-15)",
      "example": 5
    },
    "takerFee": {
      "type": "number",
      "minimum": 3,
      "maximum": 15,
      "description": "Taker fee in basis points (3-15)",
      "example": 10
    },
    "rwaMakerFee": {
      "type": "number",
      "minimum": 0,
      "maximum": 15,
      "description": "RWA maker fee in basis points (0-15)",
      "example": 5
    },
    "rwaTakerFee": {
      "type": "number",
      "minimum": 0,
      "maximum": 15,
      "description": "RWA taker fee in basis points (0-15)",
      "example": 10
    },
    "paymentType": {
      "type": "string",
      "enum": [
        "usdc",
        "order"
      ],
      "default": "order",
      "description": "Payment token type",
      "example": "order"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "txHash",
    "chain",
    "chainId",
    "chain_type",
    "brokerId",
    "makerFee",
    "takerFee",
    "rwaMakerFee",
    "rwaTakerFee",
    "paymentType"
  ]
}

responses.description: Transaction verified and broker created successfully
Invalid request - transaction verification failed, broker ID taken, or user already graduated

properties.name: isGraduated
properties.description: Whether the DEX has graduated from demo

properties.name: showOnBoard
properties.description: Whether to show on public leaderboard

properties.name: exists
properties.description: Indicates no DEX exists for this user

properties.name: isRateLimited
properties.description: Whether the user is currently rate limited

properties.name: remainingCooldownSeconds
properties.description: Seconds remaining until rate limit resets

properties.name: message
properties.example: DEX will now appear on the public board

properties.name: message
properties.example: Sign this message to authenticate with Orderly One: 123456

properties.name: isAdmin
properties.description: Whether the current user is an admin

properties.name: themes
properties.description: Array of 3 generated CSS theme variants

properties.name: overrides
properties.description: Array of 3 generated CSS override variants

properties.name: message
properties.example: Transaction verified and broker ID 'my-broker' created successfully! Your DEX has graduated automatically.

properties.name: message
properties.example: Admin wallet setup completed successfully. Your DEX has graduated!

commonErrors.description: Resource already exists (e.g., duplicate broker ID)
